definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: conceive (Ar. wah.ama v. inclauerunt pecora, Frey; Aram. [[יְחַם]] be hot, usu. of sexual impulse of animals)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. sf. [[יֶחֱמַתְנִי]] Ps 51:7 in sin my mother conceived me (‖[[חוֹלָָלְתִּי]]); Inf. cstr. of heat of cattle in breeding, conception; [[בְּכָל־יַחֵם]] Ge 30:41 at every breeding-heat of the flock (J); [[בְּעֵת]] [[יַחֵם]] Ge 31:10 at the time of  the flock's being hot in breeding (E); sf. 3 fpl. [[לְיַחֲמֶנׇּה]] Ge 30:41 in order that they might have breeding-heat (J).
